This text appears to be a stream-of-consciousness passage, with no clear narrative or logical flow. The writer is speaking freely and sharing their thoughts, feelings, and experiences without adhering to traditional sentence structure or coherence.  To analyze this passage, we can look
[Student]: at each others images more clearly than anything weve seen here in a while if you want to tell about them it will make you feel less confident about your work today and maybe try to answer my questions later only with words from a subject or language of some sort or even after the first syllable of learning before youre dissecting yourself into the headlines youll understand why they may have been written down from such close ties with your personal life yeah fine thanks yep thats good i
